Hello Post

23 September 2015

Simple Python Program

Below is a simple python program.


#!/usr/bin/python

"""
  
  Daniel Guaderrama
  Simple Python Program

"""

class helloWorld(object):

    @staticmethod

    def greeting(self):
        print "Hello World!"

helloWorld.greeting()

Can you guess what this program will do when executed?
